settings.text: We at Chinti & Parker, basic certainly doesn’t mean boring. This Autumn sees the unveiling of our highly anticipated AutumnBasics Collection. This collection is a celebration of vibrant energy. Easy-to-wear capsule staples are priced at under £95, without compromising on quality and designed with everlasting appeal in mind. Most pieces in this collection – from sweaters to cardigans – are made from a 12-gauge wool and cashmere blend that’s perfect for year-round wear. With a clean contemporary and sporty asthetic, these pieces are the perfect building blocks to your wardrobe.

settings.grid-title: V-Necks and Roll Necks: Unveil Your Creative Playgrounds
settings.grid-content: Discover the art of tone-on-tone dressing with playful layering. We have introduced an avenue for creative expression through color coordination – discover the combination that makes you uniquely you.

settings.grid-title: Hoodies: Effortlessly Chic for Relaxed Vibes
settings.grid-content: Get ready to redefine your hoodie game with our collection. Hoodies, once confined to casual settings, have now transformed into powerful fashion statements. Combining relaxed vibes with chic flair, these hoodies epitomise contemporary style with a playful twist. Whether you're heading out for a leisurely stroll or looking to unwind in comfort, these pieces effortlessly merge modern aesthetics with cozy charm.

settings.title: Nourish your Hobbies
settings.text: What makes you happy? Discover that, and then do it more often. Feeding your soul means doing things that are going to tick boxes that work just doesn’t. This may be knitting, sewing, reading, dancing, cooking… The list is endless, and it really does depend entirely on you.

settings.title: Declutter your Mind
settings.text:
With to-do lists, chores, a home to stay on top of, and looking after yourself, it’s no wonder that our minds are full. Getting as much down on paper can help you to feel more organised; visualising and breaking down what is actually on your plate can make things seem much more manageable. Try a daily task list, or even a planner.

Sometimes - no matter what you do - you may find your brain simply too full. If this sounds familiar, you may benefit from journaling. Whether you follow a certain format with bullet journaling, or prefer to dump as many thoughts onto paper as possible. Remember that there’s no set format to this; find the best method for you.

settings.title: Women’s Charcoal Cashmere Sweaters
settings.text: Deeper than grey yet still a staple that belongs in every woman’s wardrobe, explore Chinti & Parker’s luxurious edit of charcoal cashmere sweaters. From boxy silhouettes to slouchy rollnecks, our styles can be combined with an assortment of pieces, allowing you to dress for any occasion. Each of our cashmere sweaters is carefully crafted from the finest fibres; soft to the touch, cosy enough for winter yet also cool enough for summer. It’s the perfect addition to your year-round rotation. Keep your new grey cashmere jumper looking as good as the day you bought it; follow the advice in our cashmere care guide.

settings.title: Women’s Cream Cashmere Sweaters
settings.text: Knitwear drawer looking a little dull? Why not introduce one or two of Chinti & Parker’s crisp cream cashmere sweaters into the mix? The freshest colour that will instantly revitalise any wardrobe, a cream jumper will always look bright, stylish and chic. Ours are crafted from sumptuously soft cashmere for the most luxurious finish that can be worn all year round. Whether you prefer a plain staple that can be dressed up with accessories, or pops of colour and that signature Chinti & Parker detailing for unexpected flair – your new perfect piece is right here. Ensure your sweater lasts for years, by following our cashmere care guide.

MAKE SMALL, GRADUAL CHANGES

Small, gradual changes can make working towards a more sustainable lifestyle appear less overwhelming, particularly for those at the beginning of their journey. Start out small, do your research, and forgive yourself for occasional and minor setbacks - nobody becomes the perfect ethical fashion consumer overnight.

settings.grid-title: Cardigans: Versatile Layers of Fun and Coziness
settings.grid-content: These cardigans are the epitome of fun, perfectly embodying the spirit of the season. Whether you're aiming for a relaxed look or a touch of sophistication, these pieces offer the canvas for you to curate your own style narrative. Pair them with other collection items to create ensembles that pop with personality and exude contemporary style. Cardigans aren't just for warmth; they're an opportunity to showcase your fashion flair while enveloping yourself in comfort.

settings.grid-title: Wide-Leg Trousers: Stride Confidently into Contemporary Fashion
settings.grid-content: These trousers invite you to step confidently into the world of contemporary fashion. Their modern silhouette and vibrant colors align perfectly with the playful essence of the collection. Mix and match them with different tops to create outfits that pop with personality and panache. The wide-legtrousers are your gateway to a dopamine-infused fashion experience that boosts your confidence and elevates your style

settings.text: In a nutshell, our Autumn Basics Collection is a celebration of fun.  Colour pop contemporary style with the exhilarating feel of dopamine-inducing fashion. Each piece is an avenue of self-expression.

settings.grid-content: A navy cashmere sweater is the perfect go-between if you can’t decide between a neutral that will go with everything, and a hint of colour. Deep enough to match most other shades, yet rich enough to add vibrancy, does it get more classic than navy cashmere? Explore Chinti & Parker’s offering of styles in this timeless colour, each one crafted from the finest fibres that are incredibly soft to the touch. Oversized? Slouchy? Or a classic fit? You’ll find all options here. Keep your navy knitwear as vibrant as the day you bought it; simply follow the advice in our cashmere care guide .

settings.title: Women’s Orange Cashmere Sweaters
settings.text: A mood-lifting addition to your rotation, find your perfect fit in the Chinti & Parker collection of orange cashmere sweaters. Mood-lifting and guaranteed to elevate any ensemble - from smart to casual - to new levels of chic. Choose your best style - whether it’s a boxy fit, slouchy silhouette, or a rollneck - there’s something for every style. Pair this vibrant shade with any dark neutral, such as black trousers or your favourite dark wash denim for a stylish contrast. Care for our pieces well - by following our cashmere care guide - and you can wear on repeat throughout the seasons.
